Here's how to front-run everyone else’s product, content and paid media strategy using Reddit + search signals.

This workflow:
- Scans Reddit for patterns: complaints, “AI for X”, etc.
- Prioritizes threads by engagement
- Maps those themes to 30/14/7 day search data
- Picks keywords/phrases with spiking volume, low CPC 
- Generates SEO content and a paid ads strategy.
- Optionally, agent starts running ads before CPC curve rises. 

Net: a set of early, legitimate opportunities you can move on

If you’re struggling to get startup ideas; try this method:

• Think of areas where you’re above average (vs other entrepreneurs)

• Write commonly held beliefs in those areas

• Write your differentiated / contrarian beliefs in the same areas

• Think of what’s become possible or necessary lately (tech or behavior wise)

• From all this, write multiple pain-solution hypothesis with evidence of time or money spent (so you solve rich problems)

• Shortlist those ideas where you can create 10x eff

this is a killer idea for a few reasons.

most marketplace failures stem from one thing: arbitrary, trustless transactions. dating apps today optimize for top of funnel gimmicks… e.g. new swipes, new prompts, new filters but the underlying dynamics stay broken.

what actually matters is mutual trust & skin in the game. if you behave badly, there should be something to lose. social penalties is roughly how every society functions.

people act differently when they know someone’s watching.

clusters.name: Blockchain Technology Testing
clusters.summary: This resident is advocating for the exploration and implementation of blockchain-based automation systems that provide transparent, auditable, and fault-tolerant processes for municipal operations.
clusters.action: City officials should investigate blockchain automation platforms for municipal processes that require transparency, auditability, and reliable execution, potentially starting with pilot programs for simple transactional or workflow management tasks.

nodes.summary:
Tried Talus Vision on Sui testnet this week  drew a simple flow (check price → swap → log outcome), hit deploy, and watched Nexus run each step with verifiable state. Felt less like magic and more like on-chain automation that actually remembers what it did

What stuck with me
• stateful agents that don’t reset between steps
• Talus Tools making offchain calls auditable onchain
• a Leader network that handles retries and fault tolerance instead of failing silently

Also skimmed the tokenomics: 1

clusters.name: Digital Health Innovation
clusters.summary: These posts advocate for leveraging AI and digital platforms to provide personalized healthcare solutions that move beyond one-size-fits-all approaches to treat cancer, metabolic, autoimmune, and inflammatory diseases.
clusters.action: City officials should explore partnerships with digital health companies and create regulatory frameworks that support AI-driven personalized medicine platforms while ensuring they can operate effectively within municipal healthcare systems.

nodes.summary: “Every single individual is so different. But right now we still treat [cancer] with a one-size fits-all approach. And that’s where data and AI can especially step in to help,” said Simone Korsgaard Jensen, CEO and founder of Radical Health. https://fortune.com/2025/12/04/khosla-ventures-backed-radical-health-stealth-seed-ai-personalize-cancer-care/?utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=fortunemagazine&xid=soc_socialflow_twitter_FORTUNE&utm_source=twitter.com

3 years ago we raised several million dollars to launch our digital health company.  A lot of folks were mad that they missed out on the investment opportunity.  

Now we’ve gone from just an idea, to a fully operational digital health platforms seeing hundred of patients in all 50 states and most importantly getting them off medications and reversing their metabolic, autoimmune and inflammatory diseases! 

We are raising again to further expand what we can do and to start scaling massively!

Steal my o3 prompt to build a profitable AI-powered SaaS business in 60 days with zero coding required.

----------------------------
AI BUSINESS GENERATOR
----------------------------

AI SAAS BUSINESS GENERATOR
You are a specialized AI business architect who helps entrepreneurs identify, build, and launch profitable AI-powered SaaS businesses with minimal technical skills. Your system transforms market gaps into ready-to-launch products using no-code tools and AI platforms.
Execute this 5-phas

I built a 6-figure business while working 60-hour weeks in corporate.

No one knew.

Here's the exact system I used (and how AI made it stupidly simple):

Step 1: Map Your Unfair Advantages

Spent 90 min listing:
• Skills corporate paid me to learn
• Problems I solved repeatedly
• What people ask me about for free

AI prompt: "Turn these into 10 business ideas I can start with $500"

Your corporate prison IS your business school.

Step 2: Build Your Options Portfolio

Picked 3 ideas. Tested each

clusters.name: AI-Powered Digital Services
clusters.summary: Residents are advocating for AI-integrated platforms and services that make education, commerce, healthcare, and personal assistance more accessible and frictionless.
clusters.action: Partner with tech companies to pilot AI-powered municipal services and create digital literacy programs that help residents access and utilize AI tools for education, healthcare navigation, and civic engagement.

demands.description: Implement AI-enhanced educational content platforms similar to Khan Academy
Create AI-powered personal finance tools and services
Establish rapid medical service delivery (10-minute healthcare like Zepto)
Build multilingual, voice-enabled e-commerce platforms for frictionless ordering
Create pet adoption facilitation services
Provide accessible AI and human personal assistance services
Develop AR/VR applications and websites
Establish platforms for free knowledge and skill exchange without financial barriers
Create AI-powered project-based learning platforms that recommend learning paths
Implement browser time tracking with daily and weekly reporting

synthesized_actions.title: Digital Learning Hub Pilot
synthesized_actions.proposal: Launch a 6-month pilot program at 3 public libraries to provide free AI-enhanced educational platforms, multilingual learning tools, and AR/VR learning stations. Allocate $150,000 for equipment, software licenses, and staff training. Include Khan Academy-style content in Spanish and other prevalent local languages, project-based learning modules, and skill exchange matching services. Measure usage rates, learning outcomes, and community feedback before citywide expansion in 2026.
supporting_demands: Implement AI-enhanced educational content platforms similar to Khan Academy
Develop AR/VR applications and websites
Establish platforms for free knowledge and skill exchange without financial barriers

synthesized_actions.title: Municipal Digital Services Platform
synthesized_actions.proposal: Develop a city-operated digital services platform launching January 2026 featuring AI-powered personal finance tools, multilingual voice-enabled service requests, and accessible AI assistance for city services. Partner with local credit unions to provide financial literacy tools and budgeting assistance. Include browser-based time tracking for productivity programs. Start with a $300,000 budget for development and 12-month implementation timeline with quarterly progress reviews.
supporting_demands: Create AI-powered personal finance tools and services
Build multilingual, voice-enabled e-commerce platforms for frictionless ordering
Provide accessible AI and human personal assistance services
Implement browser time tracking with daily and weekly reporting

synthesized_actions.title: Community Services Innovation Pilot

Establish pet adoption kiosks in 5 high-traffic locations with digital matching services, and pilot 10-minute telehealth stations at transit hubs for basic medical consultations. Token

Gm frens 

I will be joining @Talus_Labs today; where AI agents aren't just chatting, they're straight-up competing, earning, & owning the chain like pros ⚡ 

Backed by @polychain, they're building Nexus: that decentralized heartbeat turning autonomous AI into real economic players.

clusters.name: AI Startup Validation Tools
clusters.summary: These residents are advocating for AI-powered solutions that address timeless human problems and emphasize the need for proper idea validation and market research before building startups.
clusters.action: City officials should support entrepreneurship programs that teach systematic idea validation and provide access to market research tools, while potentially partnering with AI education initiatives to help residents identify genuine market opportunities.

synthesized_actions.title: Municipal AI Innovation Incubator
synthesized_actions.proposal: Establish a city-funded AI innovation incubator program launching January 2025, providing $2M annually to support local entrepreneurs developing AI-powered consumer applications. Program offers 6-month cohorts for up to 20 startups per year, providing $25K seed funding, free co-working space in renovated municipal building, and mentorship from local tech professionals. Priority given to applications addressing health, education, productivity, and mental wellness tools. Require 2-year commitment to maintain operations within city limits. Track job creation and revenue metrics quarterly.
supporting_demands: Create AI-powered health and fitness tracking tools
Develop AI educational tools
Build AI productivity solutions
Create AI mental health support tools
Develop AI-powered photography tools
Build AI memory and note-taking tools
Develop AI finance and business tools
Build AI beauty and skincare tools
Build tools for discovering validated startup ideas and trends

synthesized_actions.title: Digital Services Business Directory
synthesized_actions.proposal: Launch a comprehensive digital services marketplace by September 2025, connecting residents with local service providers including in-home hairdressers, legal professionals offering automated services, and specialized consultants. City maintains free online platform with verification system, integrated booking, and customer review functionality. Allocate $150K for platform development and $50K annually for maintenance. Pilot with 100 verified service providers across beauty, legal, and business consulting sectors. Measure success by transaction volume and user satisfaction scores after 12 months.

nodes.summary:
Bad ideas vs good ideas

❌ Habit tracker
✅ Gut health tracker to help people fix their health issues

❌ Todo list
✅ Auto generated checklists for lawyers from a client file

❌ Link in bio
✅ Productized service to build websites for churches

❌ Directory of tools for indie hackers
✅ Directory of in-home hairdressers sorted by city

❌ The best CRM ever
✅ Browser extension to automatically create an entry to the biggest CRM on the market from a LinkedIn profile, an X account, an email etc

❌ Social

Building a startup? Focus on timeless problems, the kind people always care about:

- Fitness → AI calorie tracker
- Studying → AI tutor, flashcards generator
- Productivity → AI planner, habit tracker
- Money → AI dropshipping or finance assistant
- Beauty → AI skincare or makeup coach
- Memory → AI note-taker or summarizer
- Mental health → AI sleep or mood coach
- Photography → AI photo editor, caption writer
- Food → AI meal or grocery planner
- Relationships → AI dating coach or conversatio

My 13 Steps From Ideas to Profitable Startups.

1. Idea
The idea = my personal and professional pain. Only b2b.
Once I stopped building products for unfamiliar problems of imaginary audiences, I stopped failing as much.

2. SEO potential
I research good keywords, trends, and queries every single day to match my pains with good SEO opportunities.
I validate if people search for this solution/problem. Very often, the results might be the opposite of what my intuition says. Intuition is my enemy at

Someone should create "AI Summer Camp".

There are 254 million college students worldwide who know that AI is coming for them.

By the time today's college freshmen graduate, AI agents will have eliminated 80% of entry-level jobs. 

Enter “AI summer camp”

10 weeks. 50,000 students. Free upfront.

The curriculum could be something like

Week 1: Finding your niche (google trends, subreddits, @ideabrowser)

Week 1: building an audience/community with video (basically become the mr beast of your ni

for folks looking for startup ideas, i suggest https://www.ideabrowser.com/ find validated ideas/trends 

i built it for myself and there's a free plan that gives 1 startup idea per day, 365 year, free forever to get your creative juices flowing

happy building.

I’ve been secretly building a new startup. I can't hold it in anymore...

Replit, Bolt etc made it easier than ever to build your startup.

But most people are still guessing what to build.

Wrong idea. Wrong positioning. No growth model. This fixes that.

I've wanted software like this for 15 years because it solves the biggest problem in entrepreneurship right now.

It’s a tool for uncovering ideas with clear demand, smart positioning, and built-in distribution.

clusters.name: AI-Powered Personalized Education
clusters.summary: Residents are advocating for the implementation of AI-driven micro-education studios that provide highly personalized, niche-focused learning experiences with automated content generation and adaptive tutoring.
clusters.action: NYC should pilot AI-powered educational technology programs in select schools or community centers that can automatically generate customized learning materials and provide personalized tutoring to supplement traditional education.

demands.description: Establish AI-powered micro-education studios offering expert courses for specialized niches

synthesized_actions.title: AI Micro-Learning Studio Pilot
synthesized_actions.proposal: Launch a 6-month pilot program partnering with 2 public libraries to establish AI-powered micro-education studios offering 20-hour specialized courses in high-demand niches (coding, digital marketing, 3D printing, financial literacy). Allocate $75,000 for equipment, AI learning platforms, and instructor stipends. Target 100 adult learners in first cohort starting January 2025. Measure completion rates, skill assessments, and employment outcomes before expansion to additional library branches.
supporting_demands: Establish AI-powered micro-education studios offering expert courses for specialized niches

nodes.summary:

- Personalised learning paths for each student
- AI tutors to boost retention

clusters.name: Private Healthcare Investment Model
clusters.summary: This person is highlighting a successful example of private investment in medical research as a potential model for addressing health challenges.
clusters.action: City officials should explore partnerships with private investors and family offices to fund medical research initiatives, particularly for rare diseases affecting children in NYC schools and communities.

nodes.summary:
Amazing story

Successful investment manager quits Goldman starts his family office, pours $150m into funding trials/ research to save his daughter’s life and ultimately does as well as 20k kids annually that get diagnosed with this rare disease. Now working on others.

clusters.name: Blockchain Payment Systems
clusters.summary: This resident is advocating for implementing a blockchain-based currency system with reversible transaction capabilities for educational or municipal purposes.
clusters.action: City officials should clarify how this blockchain proposal relates to school improvements and evaluate whether emerging payment technologies could benefit educational operations or student services.

nodes.summary: hear me out. An L1 currency blockchain that can reverse transactions, for a fee, if both parties agree to it just like in old school MMORPGs
